title: Tournament
data:
The tournament is an event where players can join clans and compete against each other online for special banners and bragging rights. It usually starts directly after the release of a new version.

Official tournament pages:

* [https://crawl.develz.org/tournament/0.31/ Crawl 0.31 Tournament]
